mapper.select: SELECT d.id,d.platform_id,d.game_id,d.point,d.real_point,d.status,d.recharge_type FROM discount d WHERE d.platform_id = #{platformId} AND d.game_id = #{gameId} AND d.recharge_type =#{rechargeType} AND d.status = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE discount SET platform_id = #{platformId}, game_id = #{gameId}, point = #{point}, real_point = #{realPoint}, recharge_type = #{rechargeType}, update_date = #{updateDate}, update_user = #{updateUser} WHERE platform_id = #{platformId} AND game_id = #{gameId} AND recharge_type = #{rechargeType} AND status=1
